section.name: DataNucleus Access Platform 3.0.9 Released
section.p: Mar 28th 2012- DataNucleus Access Platform 3.0.9 ("Newton") is released. DataNucleus Access Platform provides persistence and retrieval of Java objects to/from a wide range of datastores including RDBMS, db4o, LDAP, XML, and Excel. Version 3.0.9 includes the following changes over 3.0.8

ul.li: Change Set proxy to not do clear+addAll on an update
Fix bug in removeAll() method of Set proxies
Add support for bulk loading of objects when calling pm.getObjectsById()
Fix to non-referential flush process to detect new objects correctly
Fix to persist of 1-N uni FK Lists to not to update the FK even though already set (less SQL calls)
Fix to delete of N side of a 1-N bidir catering for relation not loaded
Improved error reporting when detach fails
JPA : fix to javax.persistence.XXXDataSource persistence properties

section.p: This release is downloadable under an Apache 2 license from the DataNucleus community site.
